data.message: Why there is nothing around Morecambe, Lancaster, Blackpool yet 4 in Newcastle??? 😱

replies.message: Hi Ula, the truck tour is a huge logistical challenge and takes our teams months of planning in advance with both councils and communities. In previous years we have visited many different locations across GB, but sadly, as mentioned we can't visit every single one, each year. We'll be sure to share your feedback with our teams.
I understand that but shouldn’t the location be spread kind of evenly throughout the country instead of being rammed all in the same place
